titleStmt.title: The Christians map of the world drawne at the solmne funerals of M. Henry Chitting Esquire, Chester-Herauld at Armes, interred Ianuary 11, Anno Domini 1637. By Edward Sparke Master in Arts, and preacher at St. Mary Islington.
titleStmt.author: Sparke, Edward, d. 1692.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I. N[orton] for Richard Thrale,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
